   205‚Üí  }, [supabase]);
   206‚Üí
   207‚Üí  // Track URL changes for uelbar37 display
   208‚Üí  useEffect(() => {
   209‚Üí    // Set initial URL
   210‚Üí    setCurrentUrl(window.location.href);
   211‚Üí    
   212‚Üí    // Listen for URL changes (for pushState/replaceState)
   213‚Üí    const handleUrlChange = () => {
   214‚Üí      setCurrentUrl(window.location.href);
   215‚Üí    };
   216‚Üí    
   217‚Üí    // Listen for popstate events (back/forward buttons)
   218‚Üí    window.addEventListener('popstate', handleUrlChange);
   219‚Üí    
   220‚Üí    // Create a MutationObserver to watch for URL changes via pushState/replaceState
   221‚Üí    const observer = new MutationObserver(() => {
   222‚Üí      if (window.location.href !== currentUrl) {
   223‚Üí        setCurrentUrl(window.location.href);
   224‚Üí      }
   225‚Üí    });
   226‚Üí    
   227‚Üí    // Watch for changes to the document that might indicate URL changes
   228‚Üí    observer.observe(document, { subtree: true, childList: true });
   229‚Üí    
   230‚Üí    // Custom event listener for our URL updates
   231‚Üí    const handleCustomUrlUpdate = () => {
   232‚Üí      setCurrentUrl(window.location.href);
   233‚Üí    };
   234‚Üí    window.addEventListener('urlchange', handleCustomUrlUpdate);
   235‚Üí    
   236‚Üí    return () => {
   237‚Üí      window.removeEventListener('popstate', handleUrlChange);
   238‚Üí      window.removeEventListener('urlchange', handleCustomUrlUpdate);
   239‚Üí      observer.disconnect();
   240‚Üí    };
   241‚Üí  }, [currentUrl]);
   242‚Üí
   243‚Üí  useEffect(() => {
   244‚Üí    if (!user) {
   245‚Üí      router.push('/login');
   246‚Üí      return;
   247‚Üí    }
   248‚Üí  }, [user, router]);
   249‚Üí
   250‚Üí  // FPopup1 handlers (same pattern as /nwjar1)
   251‚Üí  const handleKz101Click = () => {
   252‚Üí    setKz101Checked(true);
   253‚Üí    setKz103Checked(false);
   254‚Üí  };
   255‚Üí
   256‚Üí  const handleKz103Click = () => {
   257‚Üí    setKz103Checked(true);
   258‚Üí    setKz101Checked(false);
   259‚Üí  };
   260‚Üí
   261‚Üí  // Update URL parameters for popup state
   262‚Üí  const updatePopupURL = (fpopOpen: boolean, tabActive?: string) => {
   263‚Üí    const url = new URL(window.location.href);
   264‚Üí    
   265‚Üí    if (fpopOpen) {
   266‚Üí      url.searchParams.set('fpop', 'open');
   267‚Üí      
   268‚Üí      // Clear all tab parameters first
   269‚Üí      ['ptab1', 'ptab2', 'ptab3', 'ptab4', 'ptab5', 'ptab6', 'ptab7'].forEach(tab => {
   270‚Üí        url.searchParams.delete(tab);
   271‚Üí      });
   272‚Üí      
   273‚Üí      // Set the active tab parameter
   274‚Üí      if (tabActive) {
   275‚Üí        url.searchParams.set(tabActive, 'active');
   276‚Üí      } else {
   277‚Üí        // Default to ptab1 if no specific tab provided
   278‚Üí        url.searchParams.set('ptab1', 'active');
   279‚Üí      }
   280‚Üí    } else {
   281‚Üí      // Remove popup and all tab parameters when popup is closed
   282‚Üí      url.searchParams.delete('fpop');
   283‚Üí      ['ptab1', 'ptab2', 'ptab3', 'ptab4', 'ptab5', 'ptab6', 'ptab7'].forEach(tab => {
   284‚Üí        url.searchParams.delete(tab);
   285‚Üí      });
   286‚Üí    }
   287‚Üí    
   288‚Üí    // Update URL without triggering page reload
   289‚Üí    window.history.replaceState({}, '', url.toString());
   290‚Üí    
   291‚Üí    // Trigger custom event to update our URL display
   292‚Üí    window.dispatchEvent(new Event('urlchange'));
   293‚Üí  };
   294‚Üí
   295‚Üí  // Handle popup open/close with URL updates
   296‚Üí  const handlePopupOpen = () => {
   297‚Üí    setIsPopupOpen(true);
   298‚Üí    
   299‚Üí    // Set default selection if neither option is selected
   300‚Üí    if (!kz101Checked && !kz103Checked) {
   301‚Üí      setKz101Checked(true);
   302‚Üí    }
   303‚Üí    
   304‚Üí    // Check if URL has specific tab parameter
   305‚Üí    const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
   306‚Üí    const hasTabInUrl = ['ptab1', 'ptab2', 'ptab3', 'ptab4', 'ptab5', 'ptab6', 'ptab7']
   307‚Üí      .some(tab => urlParams.get(tab) === 'active');
   308‚Üí    
   309‚Üí    if (!hasTabInUrl) {
   310‚Üí      // No tab specified in URL, use last remembered tab from localStorage
   311‚Üí      const lastTab = localStorage.getItem('reddjar_lastActiveTab') || 'ptab1';
   312‚Üí      setActivePopupTab(lastTab as any);
   313‚Üí      updatePopupURL(true, lastTab);
   314‚Üí    } else {
   315‚Üí      // URL has tab specified, use current activePopupTab
   316‚Üí      updatePopupURL(true, activePopupTab);
   317‚Üí    }
   318‚Üí  };
   319‚Üí
   320‚Üí  const handlePopupClose = () => {
   321‚Üí    setIsPopupOpen(false);
   322‚Üí    updatePopupURL(false);
   323‚Üí  };
   324‚Üí
   325‚Üí  // Handle tab changes with URL updates and localStorage
   326‚Üí  const handleTabChange = (tab: string) => {
   327‚Üí    setActivePopupTab(tab as any);
   328‚Üí    localStorage.setItem('reddjar_lastActiveTab', tab); // Remember this tab for next time
   329‚Üí    updatePopupURL(true, tab);

const { createClient } = require('@supabase/supabase-js');
const supabase = createClient(process.env.SUPABASE_URL, process.env.SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY);

async function checkReddjarTagsTables() {
  try {
    console.log('Checking for redditurlsvat_tags table...');

```
818‚Üí  const fetchOutboundLinks = async (urlId: number) => {
   819‚Üí    if (outboundLinks[urlId]) {
   820‚Üí      return; // Already fetched
   821‚Üí    }
   822‚Üí
   823‚Üí    setLoadingLinks(prev => new Set(prev).add(urlId));
   824‚Üí    
   825‚Üí    try {
   826‚Üí      const { data, error } = await supabase
   827‚Üí        .from('redditoblinks')
   828‚Üí        .select('*')
   829‚Üí        .eq('source_url_id', urlId)
   830‚Üí        .order('created_at', { ascending: false });
   831‚Üí
   832‚Üí      if (error) {
   833‚Üí        console.error('Error fetching outbound links:', error);
   834‚Üí        return;
   835‚Üí      }
   836‚Üí
   837‚Üí      setOutboundLinks(prev => ({
   838‚Üí        ...prev,
   839‚Üí        [urlId]: data || []
   840‚Üí      }));
   841‚Üí    } catch (error) {
   842‚Üí      console.error('Error fetching outbound links:', error);
   843‚Üí    } finally {
   844‚Üí      setLoadingLinks(prev => {
   845‚Üí        const newSet = new Set(prev);
   846‚Üí        newSet.delete(urlId);
   847‚Üí        return newSet;
   848‚Üí      });
   849‚Üí    }
   850‚Üí  };
   851‚Üí
   852‚Üí  // Toggle expanded row
   853‚Üí  const toggleRowExpansion = (urlId: number) => {
   854‚Üí    const newExpanded = new Set(expandedRows);
   855‚Üí    if (newExpanded.has(urlId)) {
   856‚Üí      newExpanded.delete(urlId);
   857‚Üí    } else {
   858‚Üí      newExpanded.add(urlId);
   859‚Üí      // Fetch outbound links when expanding
   860‚Üí      fetchOutboundLinks(urlId);
   861‚Üí    }
   862‚Üí    setExpandedRows(newExpanded);
   863‚Üí  };

   764‚Üí                              tagsData?.tags?.map((tag: any) => (
   765‚Üí                                <tr key={tag.tag_id} className="hover:bg-gray-50">
   766‚Üí                                  <td className="px-4 py-3">
   767‚Üí                                    <input
   768‚Üí                                      type="checkbox"
   769‚Üí                                      checked={tagsData?.selectedTags?.has(tag.tag_id) || false}
   770‚Üí                                      onChange={(e) => tagsData?.functions?.handleTagSelection(tag.tag_id, e.target.checked)}
   771‚Üí                                      className="text-blue-600 focus:ring-blue-500 border-gray-300 rounded"
   772‚Üí                                    />
   773‚Üí                                  </td>
   774‚Üí                                  <td className="px-4 py-3 text-sm text-gray-900 font-mono">
   775‚Üí                                    {tag.tag_id?.substring(0, 8)}...
   776‚Üí                                  </td>
   777‚Üí                                  <td className="px-4 py-3 text-sm text-gray-900">
   778‚Üí                                    {tagsData?.formData?.editingTagId === tag.tag_id ? (
   779‚Üí                                      <input
   780‚Üí                                        type="text"
   781‚Üí                                        value={tagsData?.formData?.editingTagName || ''}
   782‚Üí                                        onChange={(e) => tagsData?.formData?.setEditingTagName(e.target.value)}
   783‚Üí                                        className="w-full px-2 py-1 border border-gray-300 rounded text-sm"
   784‚Üí                                      />
   785‚Üí                                    ) : (
   786‚Üí                                      tag.tag_name
   787‚Üí                                    )}
   788‚Üí                                  </td>
   789‚Üí                                  <td className="px-4 py-3 text-sm text-gray-900">
   790‚Üí                                    {tagsData?.formData?.editingTagId === tag.tag_id ? (
   791‚Üí                                      <input
   792‚Üí                                        type="number"
   793‚Üí                                        value={tagsData?.formData?.editingTagOrder || 0}
   794‚Üí                                        onChange={(e) => tagsData?.formData?.setEditingTagOrder(parseInt(e.target.value) || 0)}
   795‚Üí                                        className="w-20 px-2 py-1 border border-gray-300 rounded text-sm"
   796‚Üí                                      />
   797‚Üí                                    ) : (
   798‚Üí                                      tag.tag_order || 0
   799‚Üí                                    )}
   800‚Üí                                  </td>
   801‚Üí                                  <td className="px-4 py-3 text-sm text-gray-500">
   802‚Üí                                    {tag.created_at ? new Date(tag.created_at).toLocaleDateString() : '-'}
   803‚Üí                                  </td>
   804‚Üí                                  <td className="px-4 py-3 text-sm text-gray-500">
   805‚Üí                                    {tag.updated_at ? new Date(tag.updated_at).toLocaleDateString() : '-'}
   806‚Üí                                  </td>
   807‚Üí                                  <td className="px-4 py-3 text-sm text-gray-500">
   808‚Üí                                    {tag.url_count || 0}
   809‚Üí                                  </td>
   810‚Üí                                  <td className="px-4 py-3 text-sm">
   811‚Üí                                    <div className="flex space-x-2">
   812‚Üí                                      {tagsData?.formData?.editingTagId === tag.tag_id ? (
   813‚Üí                                        <>
   814‚Üí                                          <button
   815‚Üí                                            onClick={() => tagsData?.functions?.handleUpdateTag()}
   816‚Üí                                            disabled={tagsData?.loadingStates?.isUpdatingTag}
   817‚Üí                                            className="px-3 py-1 bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 disabled:bg-blue-400 text-white text-xs rounded"
   818‚Üí                                          >
   819‚Üí                                            {tagsData?.loadingStates?.isUpdatingTag ? 'Saving...' : 'Save'}
   820‚Üí                                          </button>
   821‚Üí                                          <button
   822‚Üí                                            onClick={() => tagsData?.functions?.cancelEditingTag()}
   823‚Üí                                            className="px-3 py-1 bg-gray-600 hover:bg-gray-700 text-white text-xs rounded"
   824‚Üí                                          >
   825‚Üí                                            Cancel
   826‚Üí                                          </button>
   827‚Üí                                        </>
   828‚Üí                                      ) : (
   829‚Üí                                        <>
   830‚Üí                                          <button
   831‚Üí                                            onClick={() => tagsData?.functions?.startEditingTag(tag)}
   832‚Üí                                            className="px-3 py-1 bg-yellow-600 hover:bg-yellow-700 text-white text-xs rounded"
   833‚Üí                                          >
   834‚Üí                                            Edit
   835‚Üí                                          </button>
   836‚Üí                                          <button
   837‚Üí                                            onClick={() => tagsData?.functions?.handleDeleteTag(tag.tag_id)}
   838‚Üí                                            disabled={tagsData?.loadingStates?.isDeletingTag?.has(tag.tag_id)}
   839‚Üí                                            className="px-3 py-1 bg-red-600 hover:bg-red-700 disabled:bg-red-400 text-white text-xs rounded"
   840‚Üí                                          >
   841‚Üí                                            {tagsData?.loadingStates?.isDeletingTag?.has(tag.tag_id) ? 'Deleting...' : 'Delete'}
   842‚Üí                                          </button>
   843‚Üí                                        </>
   844‚Üí                                      )}
   845‚Üí                                    </div>
   846‚Üí                                  </td>
   847‚Üí                                </tr>
   848‚Üí                              ))
   849‚Üí                            )}
   850‚Üí                          </tbody>
   851‚Üí                        </table>
   852‚Üí                      </div>
   853‚Üí                    </div>
   854‚Üí                  </div>
   855‚Üí                )}
   856‚Üí                {activePopupTab === 'ptab4' && (
   857‚Üí                  <div>
   858‚Üí                    <p className="text-gray-500">ptab4 content area - currently blank</p>
   859‚Üí                  </div>
```
